title: Charlie Puth Is Finally Comfortable in the Spotlight
text:
It didn’t take long for 27-year-old singer Charlie Puth to make peace with the fact that his radio-friendly debut album, 2016’s Nine Track Mind, was largely a misfire. “That album... It hurts me,” he says. “It was very rudimentary production, but it was me. [The album] was super rushed and didn’t feel like me at all.”

With the gift of perfect pitch—the ability to correctly identify the exact note of any sound he hears—and a Berklee College of Music education, Puth seemed destined for more than formulaic drivel. The New Jersey...
description: The Grammy-nominated singer gets the call when Katy Perry and Ozzy Osborne need fresh ideas. Is his next move a country album?
